snippet: Though Bill de Blasio has taken pains to frame himself as anti-Bloomberg, a de Blasio administration is likely to deepen and extend some of Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s policies.
abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column holds Democrat Bill de Blasio may have taken pains to frame himself as anti-Bloomberg in campaign for New York City mayor, but a de Blasio administration is likely to deepen and extend some of Mayor Michael R Bloomberg’s policies.
lead_paragraph: Though Bill de Blasio has taken pains to frame himself as anti-Bloomberg, a de Blasio administration is likely to deepen and extend some of Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s policies.

headline.main: The Opposite of Bloomberg? Not So Fast
headline.print_headline: The Opposite Of Bloomberg? Not So Fast
